versos: (place) Psalm 90:1 - "Lord, you have been our dwelling place throughout all generations.";;;
(removeth) Proverbs 10:6 - "Blessings are upon the head of the just: but violence covereth the mouth of the wicked.";;;
(cover) 1 Peter 4:8 - "Above all, love each other deeply, because love covers over a multitude of sins.";;;
(rome) Romans 1:7 - To all in rome who are loved by God and called to be his holy people: Grace and peace to you from God our Father and from the Lord Jesus Christ.;;;

(laban) Genesis 29:25 - "And it came to pass, that in the morning, behold, it was Leah: and he said to laban, What is this thou hast done unto me did not I serve with thee for Rachel wherefore then hast thou beguiled me";;;
(deadly) Proverbs 16:27 - "A scoundrel plots evil, and on their lips it is like a scorching fire.";;;
(equity) Psalm 98:9 - He will judge the world with equity.;;;
(watered) Psalm 1:3 - "That person is like a tree planted by streams of water, which yields its fruit in season and whose leaf does not witherwhatever they do prospers.";;;
(vulgar) There is no Bible verse that contains the word "vulgar".;;;
(deep) Proverbs 3:20 - "By his knowledge the deeps broke open.";;;

(sealed) Ephesians 1:13 - "And you also were included in Christ when you heard the message of truth, the gospel of your salvation. When you believed, you were marked in him with a seal, the promised Holy Spirit,";;;
(pray) James 5:16 - "Therefore confess your sins to each other and pray for each other so that you may be healed. The prayer of a righteous person is powerful and effective.";;;
(answer) Psalm 145:18 - "The Lord is near to all who call on him, to all who call on him in truth.";;;
(known) Jeremiah 1:5 - "Before I formed you in the womb I knew you, before you were born I set you apart; I appointed you as a prophet to the nations.";;;
(dew) Psalm 133:3 - It is as if the dew of Hermon were falling on Mount Zion. For there the Lord bestows his blessing
(gideon) Judges 6:12 - "When the angel of the Lord appeared to gideon, he said, The Lord is with you, mighty warrior.";;;
